Description:

The Wolf Among Us will be a prequel to the comic book Fables (which emit DC Vertigo) and will consist of several parts.
In the world of games and comic characters known fairy tales have been transferred in a gloomy New York, where they had perforce to settle down in a harsh society people.
The protagonist of The Wolf Among Us will be BIGBUY Wolf (Bigby Wolf - ie, Big Bad Wolf, classic Angry gray wolf from the fairy tales of Little Red Riding Hood and the Three Little Pigs), which is now a hardened detective in New York.
Although Wolfe is the human form, it lives inside a bloodthirsty beast, which have to hold back the detective.
